text: Hello! I purchased a "free" image module from the marketing place but when I placed it in my web page it is pulling css from an external bootstrap css page and is messing with the color of my links. How would I force the page to use the local css before the external one for that free module?
As far as I can tell `auto_custom_max` is used with images that have custom `max-width` & `max-height` , but it's nowhere in the docs

Iâ€™m cloning a couple default HubSpot modules like linked_image so I can add some options to the Styles tab. I notice when I define style fields the default ones go away. Is there a way to retain them and just add my fields?
